snippet: New York City investigators found falsified student transcripts and credit given for courses, leading to the granting of unearned diplomas to some Theatre Arts Production Company School students.
abstract: Lynn Passarella is removed as principal of the Theater Arts Production Company School in the Bronx; New York City Education Department investigation had determined that Passarella and her staff had falsified middle and high school student transcripts for years, awarding some students diplomas they had not earned and creating an artificially high graduation rate for the school.
lead_paragraph: New York City investigators found falsified student transcripts and credit given for courses, leading to the granting of unearned diplomas to some Theatre Arts Production Company School students.

headline.seo: Principal at Tapco in Bronx Is Removed Over Students’ Records
headline.main: Principal Is Removed Over Findings of Falsified Student Records
headline.print_headline: Principal Is Removed Over Students’ Records
